text: is a Japanese snowboarder. She competed in the 2018 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:People from Toyama (city) Category:Sportspeople from Toyama Prefecture Category:Snowboarders at the 2018 Winter Olympics Category:Competitors at the 2012 Winter Youth Olympics Category:Japanese female snowboarders Category:Olympic snowboarders of Japan Category:Snowboarders at the 2017 Asian Winter Games Category:Youth Olympic gold medalists for Japan
title: Hikaru Ōe
